title: Dejavu
lyrics:
Doo roo tu doo roo tu
Doo roo tu tu doo doo ru
Doo roo tu doo roo tu
Doo roo tu tu doo doo ru ru tu tu
Nan neol geuriwohago
Neoneun nal gidarige hae

Areumdabdorok apeun nae mameun

Neoro mandeulgo muneojyeo naneun



Gipeun mami chehago, gieogi dwibakkwin dwiro

Mundeuk eoneu nare nal boneun geot gata

Oh yeah



Shiganeul dwiro georeo neo itneun gose

Nal deryeoda meomulge haejwo oh eh oh



Naega neoye gieok soge boiji anado

Naneun neoye naneun

Neo eopshi sumeul shwil su eopseunikka



Gieogeul geotneun igose

Charari nal gadwojwo dejavu

Shiganeul nado moreuge sogyeo

Gyesok meomchwo isseo jwo dejavu



Say woo woo woo woo woo

Woo woo woo woo woo

Jamshirado sarajimyeon an dwae deja dejavu

Say woo woo woo woo woo

Woo woo woo woo woo

Geuriwoseo noraehane naye deja dejavu



Doo roo tu doo roo tu

Doo roo tu tu doo doo ru



Manggajyeo beorin gieoge nungama

Seoro jeonghaejin kkeucheul dollyeonwa

Unmyeonge sarojabhyeoseo

Geurium ane hollo namgyeojyeo



Balkeun goseul georeumyeo bicheul namgyeojwo

Yeogiseo na neoreul boda oh eh oh



Neoye dwieseo geurimjaga dwaedo joa

Naneun neoye naneun

Nega piryohae



Gieogeul geotneun igose

Charari nal gadwojwo dejavu

Shiganeul nado moreuge sogyeo

Gyesok meomchwo isseo jwo dejavu dejavu



Naman itteon geoul soge

Nega isseo

Nega boyeo

Neodo nareul bogo isseo



Say woo woo woo woo woo

Woo woo woo woo woo

Jamshirado sarajimyeon an dwae deja dejavu

Say woo woo woo woo woo

Woo woo woo woo woo

[AR/BH] geuriwoseo noraehane naye deja dejavu



Doo roo tu doo roo tu

Doo roo tu tu doo doo ru

Doo roo tu doo roo tu

Doo roo tu tu doo doo ru ru tu tu
